exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0xe8a82c"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="CardSkin" width="80" height="114" currentState="normal" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="normal,selected" >
	<e:Image id="cardImg" source="ClubEight_png" x="0" bottom.normal="0" top.selected="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5" source="btn1_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="33" textColor="0xFFFFFF" textAlign="center" text="开始游戏" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-2.5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="CreateSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="hlddz.00045_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label text="欢迎加入斗地主，快起个有个性的名字吧~" x="157.68" y="90.43" size="47" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0x000000" anchorOffsetX="0" width="650" anchorOffsetY="0" stroke="2" strokeColor="0xffffff"/>
	<e:TextInput id="inputName" width="386.67" height="89.69" y="230.31" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Button id="btnCreate" label="创建" y="369.88" skinName="ButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ButtonSmallestSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="100" height="40">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5" source="btn3_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="15" textColor="0xFFFFFF" textAlign="center" text="开始游戏" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-2.5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ChatSkin" width="304" height="370" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Image source="panel-orange_png" x="0" y="0" scale9Grid="15,15,96,96" anchorOffsetX="0" width="304" anchorOffsetY="0" height="370"/>
	<e:Scroller width="285" height="355" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" x="10" y="8">
		<e:List>
			<e:itemRendererSkinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" width="285">
	<e:Rect fillColor="0xffffff" left="7" right="7" top="7" bottom="7" fillAlpha="0.5"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="5" bottom="5" left="8" right="8" size="20" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" anchorOffsetX="0" text="大家好，很高兴见到大家~" textColor="0x000000"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:itemRendererSkinName>
			<e:ArrayCollection>
				<e:Array>
					<e:Object a="null"/>
					<e:Object a="null"/>
					<e:Object a="null"/>
					<e:Object a="null"/>
					<e:Object a="null"/>
					<e:Object a="null"/>
					<e:Object a="null"/>
					<e:Object a="null"/>
				</e:Array>
			</e:ArrayCollection>
		</e:List>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="FightSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image source="Common_BG4_2x_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	
	
	<e:Image source="dou_png" x="76.81" y="593"/>
	<e:Label id="lblBeen" text="x 9999" x="140" y="605" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Button id="btnChat" label="快速喊话" x="734.25" y="600" anchorOffsetX="0" width="108.72" anchorOffsetY="0" height="43.25" skinName="ButtonSmallestSkin"/>
	<ns1:ChatView id="chatView" x="634" y="228" skinName="ChatSkin" visible="false"/>
	
	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MainSkin" width="960" height="640" currentState="normal" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" states="normal,matching" >
	<w:Declarations>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Image source="new_BJ_png" anchorOffsetX="0" width="1105" anchorOffsetY="0" height="650" x="-72" y="-5" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="jishianniudi_png" x="22" y="22" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="default_png" x="12" y="15.5" locked="true"/>
	<e:Label id="lblName" text="Name" y="41" bold="true" textColor="0x0962f4" size="25" horizontalCenter="-293.5"/>
	<e:Label text="经验：" y="82.5" textColor="0x0962F4" size="16" horizontalCenter="-321" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label id="lblLv" text="Lv.99" y="41" bold="true" textColor="0x0962F4" size="25" horizontalCenter="-216.5"/>
	<e:ProgressBar id="proExp" width="140" height="20" x="181.97" y="80.5" anchorOffsetX="0" value="50"/>
	<e:Image source="dou_png" x="95" y="124"/>
	<e:Label id="lblBeen" text="x 123445" x="156" y="132"/>
	<e:Image id="btnMatch" source="kuaisu_choose_png" y="531" horizontalCenter="0" includeIn="normal"/>
	<e:Image source="huanledou_png" x="211.97" y="284" includeIn="matching"/>
	<e:Label id="label" text="正在寻找房间..." y="398" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" horizontalCenter="0" stroke="3" includeIn="matching"/>
	<e:Image id="btnCancel" source="quxiao_loding (2)_png" x="423.5" y="462" includeIn="matching"/>
	<e:Button id="btnEnter" label="进入房间" skinName="ButtonSkin" includeIn="matching" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="btnSetting" source="setting_png" x="844.97" y="15.03" anchorOffsetX="0" width="93.82" anchorOffsetY="0" height="93.82"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MyPlayerSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="cardGroup" height="114" y="526" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="-54"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="StartSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="logo_png" verticalCenter="-68.5" anchorOffsetX="0" horizontalCenter="0" width="566.04" anchorOffsetY="0" height="357"/>
	<e:Button id="btnStart" label="开始游戏" y="484" skinName="ButtonSkin" left="180"/>
	<e:Button id="btnRegist" label="注册账号" y="484" skinName="ButtonSkin" right="180"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="TableSkin" width="960" height="163" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Image source="jujsidai_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="cardGroup" y="24" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="CardBack_png" y="0" x="0"/>
		<e:Image source="CardBack_png" y="0" x="98"/>
		<e:Image source="CardBack_png" y="0" x="195"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="26"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ButtonBlueSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5" source="btn2_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="33" textColor="0xFFFFFF" textAlign="center" text="开始游戏" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-6"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ButtonBlueSmallSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="181" height="82" height.up="72">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" alpha.disabled="0.5" source="btn2_png" scale9Grid="59,15,136,45"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="25" textColor="0xFFFFFF" textAlign="center" text="开始游戏" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-6"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ButtonCloseSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="72">
    <e:Image alpha.disabled="0.5" source="close_btn_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ButtonSmallSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" height.up="72">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5" source="btn3_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="25" textColor="0xFFFFFF" textAlign="center" text="开始游戏" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-2.5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="leftOperShowCom" states="text,outcard,normal" currentState="normal" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Group id="outArea" height="114" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" width="262" horizontalCenter="0" visible.text="false" includeIn="text,outcard">
                    <e:layout>
                    <e:HorizontalLayout gap="-54"/>
                    </e:layout>
			<ns1:CardCtrl x="23" y="39" skinName="CardSkin"/>
			<ns1:CardCtrl x="33" y="49" skinName="CardSkin"/>
			<ns1:CardCtrl x="43" y="59" skinName="CardSkin"/>
			<ns1:CardCtrl x="53" y="69" skinName="CardSkin"/>
			<ns1:CardCtrl x="63" y="79" skinName="CardSkin"/>
			<ns1:CardCtrl x="73" y="89" skinName="CardSkin"/>
			<ns1:CardCtrl x="83" y="99" skinName="CardSkin"/>
			<ns1:CardCtrl x="93" y="109" skinName="CardSkin"/>
                    
                </e:Group>
	<e:Label id="operLabel" text="准备" includeIn="text" y="42" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" stroke="3" left="50"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LeftPlayerSkin" width="960" height="640" currentState="ready" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*"  states="ready,start" >
	<w:Config id="160a017ec78"/>
<e:Image id="playerImg" source="Farmer_png" x="-2.19" y="185.22" anchorOffsetX="0" width="130" anchorOffsetY="0" height="161.56"/>
	<ns1:OperShowCom id="operShowCom" y="158" skinName="leftOperShowCom" left="227"/>
	<e:Label id="cardNum" text="剩余：17张" y="358.54" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" left="20" includeIn="start"/>
	<e:Image id="cardImg" source="CardBack_png" y="232" left="143" includeIn="start"/>
</e:Skin>

    <e:Group id="outArea" height="114" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" width="262" horizontalCenter="0" visible.text="false" includeIn="text,outcard">

                    </e:layout>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RightPlayerSkin" width="960" height="640" currentState="ready" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*" states="ready,start" >
<e:Image id="playerImg" source="Farmer_png" x="960" y="185.22" anchorOffsetX="0" width="130" anchorOffsetY="0" height="161.56" scaleX="-1"/>

	<e:Image id="cardImg" source="CardBack_png" y="232" right="143" includeIn="start"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="userOperShowCom" states="text,outcard,normal" currentState="normal" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Group id="outArea" height="114" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" width="262" horizontalCenter="0" visible.text="false" includeIn="text,outcard">
                    <e:layout>
                    <e:HorizontalLayout gap="-54"/>
                    </e:layout>
			<ns1:CardCtrl x="23" y="39" skinName="CardSkin"/>
			<ns1:CardCtrl x="33" y="49" skinName="CardSkin"/>
			<ns1:CardCtrl x="43" y="59" skinName="CardSkin"/>
			<ns1:CardCtrl x="53" y="69" skinName="CardSkin"/>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="operComSkin" states="ready,grab,outCard,normal"  width="440" height="72" currentState="ready" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Button id="btnReady" label="准备" skinName="ButtonBlueSmallSkin" includeIn="ready" horizontalCenter="0" name="btnReady"/>
    <e:Button id="btnGrab" label="抢地主" skinName="ButtonBlueSmallSkin" includeIn="grab" left="0" name="btnGrab"/>
    <e:Button id="btnUnGrab" label="不抢" skinName="ButtonBlueSmallSkin" y="0" includeIn="grab" right="0" name="btnUnGrab"/>
    <e:Button id="btnOutCard" label="出牌" skinName="ButtonBlueSmallSkin" includeIn="outCard" left="0" name="btnOutCard"/>
    <e:Button id="btnPass" label="不出" skinName="ButtonBlueSmallSkin" y="0" includeIn="outCard" right="0" name="btnPass"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="UserPlayerSkin" width="960" height="640" currentState="ready" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="ready,start" >
    <e:Image id="playerImg" source="Farmer_png" x="62.81" y="431.22" anchorOffsetX="0" width="130" anchorOffsetY="0" height="161.56"/>
	<ns1:OperShowCom id="operShowCom" y="336" skinName="userOperShowCom" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<ns1:OperCom id="operCom" y="440" skinName="operComSkin" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="cardNum" text="剩余：17张" x="20" y="604" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" includeIn="start"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LoginSkin" width="396" height="438" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group width="358" bottom="0" horizontalCenter="0" height="401">
		<e:Image source="panel-orange_png" scale9Grid="15,15,96,96" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Label text="准备好战斗了吗？" y="48.52" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="32" x="50"/>
		<e:Label text="账号：" x="42" y="153.69" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
		<e:Label text="密码：" x="42" y="233.73" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
		<e:TextInput id="inputAccount" width="180" height="45" x="132" y="151.64" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
		<e:TextInput id="inputPwd" width="180" height="45" x="132" y="227.38" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" displayAsPassword="true"/>
		<e:Button id="btnLogin" label="登录" y="311.64" skinName="ButtonSmallSkin" x="88"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="btnClose" label="Button" x="324" y="6" skinName="ButtonCloseSkin"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="OverSkin" width="584" height="439" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group bottom="25" left="25" right="25" top="25">
		<e:Image scale9Grid="15,15,96,96" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="goods_BG2_png"/>
		<e:Label id="lblWinIdentity" text="地主胜利" y="48.52" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="59" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0" stroke="2"/>
		<e:Button id="btnBack" label="返回主菜单" y="270.73" skinName="ButtonSmallSkin" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="lblWinBeen" text="欢乐豆：+1000" y="164.5" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="57" textColor="0xc61515" horizontalCenter="0" stroke="2" strokeColor="0xffffff"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RegistSkin" width="436" height="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group bottom="0" width="360" horizontalCenter="0" height="412">
		<e:Image scale9Grid="15,15,96,96" source="panel-blue_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Label text="欢迎加入斗地主的世界！" y="48.52" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="28" x="24"/>
		<e:Label text="账号：" x="42" y="120.69" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
		<e:TextInput id="inputAccount" width="180" height="45" x="132" y="118.64" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
		<e:Label text="密码：" x="42" y="200.73" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
		<e:TextInput id="inputPwd" width="180" height="45" x="132" y="194.38" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" displayAsPassword="true"/>
		<e:Label text="重复：" x="42" y="271.73" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
		<e:TextInput id="inputPwdRepeat" width="180" height="45" x="132" y="265.38" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" displayAsPassword="true"/>
		<e:Button id="btnRegist" label="注册" y="327.64" skinName="ButtonBlueSmallSkin" x="88"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="btnClose" label="Button" x="355" y="6" skinName="ButtonCloseSkin"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SettingSkin" width="511" height="342" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="panel-orange_png" scale9Grid="15,15,96,96" left="15" right="15" top="5" bottom="5"/>
	<e:Button id="btnClose" label="Button" x="439" y="0" skinName="ButtonCloseSkin"/>
	<e:Label text="音乐开关:" x="101" y="115" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" stroke="2" strokeColor="0x422727"/>
	<e:Label text="音量大小:" x="101" y="170" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" stroke="2" strokeColor="0x422727"/>
	<e:ToggleSwitch label="ToggleButton" x="281" y="117"/>
</e:Skin>
